title: Barracuda CloudGen Firewall
description: The dashboard provides a visual summary of firewall activity, security events, user access, and system health to help monitor and analyze network security in real time.

definition.content: This dashboard provides an overview of firewall status, network activity, security threats, and system performance. It offers real-time monitoring and analytics, making it easier for administrators to manage network security efficiently.
Displays logs generated by ATP, IPS, DNS Sinkhole, and the Virus Scanner.

definition.title: Top Reasons For Firewall Threat Events
Top Actions for Firewall Threat Events

definition.content: Provides in-depth information about firewall rule processing and firewall activity logs.

definition.title: Top Firewall Activity Logs From Blocked IP List
Top Reasons For Firewall Activity Events
Top Firewall Activity IPs From Allowed IP List

definition.content: Displays audit logs from the firewall.
Displays logs concerning general firewall configuration changes and ruleset updates, including operation details and time settings.

definition.title: Top Firewall Events from Blocked Hosts

definition.content: Displays information about login and access attempts to the CloudGen Firewall, including access source and session management.
Contains logs generated by the Intrusion Prevention System, showing database file download status and information.

definition.title: IPS Download Events From Allowed Hosts
IPS Download Events from Blocked Hosts

definition.content: Displays logs from the AuditOp service.
Displays information about configuration changes such as adding or removing services and activation processes.

definition.title: Volume of Config Changes Events Over Time

definition.content: Contains information about login, authentication, and connection status of administrative sessions by displaying IP address and port, and shows the operative processes initiated by the administrative instance.
Displays logs from the EventS service.
Displays logs concerning synchronization processes, showing connection details, update status, and progress.
Logs for authentication processes, and access information concerning user groups, access interfaces, and domains of external authentication services.
View logs about downloading processes initiated by the configuration daemon, providing information concerning progress, changes, and signatures.

definition.title: Config Daemon Download Events by User

definition.content: Displays events that are generated by the box ssh daemon, collecting information such as connection details, data transfer, and session behavior.

definition.title: Top Reasons For SSH Config Events
